survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Pet Boarding Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have used pet boarding services to evaluate their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall service provided by the pet boarding facility?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for better measurement of satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.
